Mark Nwagwu bụ onye Naijiria na-ede abụ, onye na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ na Prọfesọ nke cell molecular biology na Mahadum Ibadan Ọrụ ya apụtala na Vanguard, The Punch, ThisDay na Premium Times.
A mụrụ Nwagwu na Obaetiti, Nguru Aboh Mbaise na Imo Steeti
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi Mahadum dị elu na Mahadum Ibadan ruo mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká na 2002
Ọ bụkwa onye nsonye na Nigerian Academy of Science
